title: ${food_singular} yield
subtitle: Yield is measured as the quantity produced per unit area of land used to grow it.

title: ${food_singular} yield
subtitle: Yield is measured as the quantity produced per animal.

title: Land used for ${food_singular_lower} production
subtitle: The amount of cropland used for production

title: ${food_singular} imports
subtitle: The quantity that is imported in a given year.

title: ${food_singular} exports  The quantity that is exported in a given year.
Domestic supply of ${food_plural_lower}
subtitle: This measures the supply that is available after trade. It is calculated as production, plus imports, minus exports.

title: ${food_plural} used for direct human food
subtitle: The quantity that is allocated for direct consumption as human food, rather than allocation to animal feed or industrial uses.

title: ${food_plural} used for animal feed
subtitle: The quantity that is allocated to feed for livestock.

title: ${food_plural} used for industrial uses
subtitle: The quantity that is allocated to industrial uses such as biofuel, pharmaceuticals or textile products.

title: ${food_singular} waste
subtitle: The quantity that is lost or wasted in supply chains through poor handling, spoiling, lack of refrigeration and damage from the field to retail. It does not include consumer waste.

title: Per capita ${food_singular_lower} consumption per year
subtitle: This measures the quantity that is available for consumption at the end of the supply chain. It does not account for consumer waste, so the quantity that is actually consumed may be lower than this value.

title: Per capita kilocalorie consumption from ${food_plural_lower} per day
subtitle: This measures the quantity that is available for consumption at the end of the supply chain. It does not account for consumer waste, so the quantity that is actually consumed may be lower than this value.

title: Per capita protein consumption from ${food_plural_lower} per day
subtitle: This measures the quantity that is available for consumption at the end of the supply chain. It does not account for consumer waste, so the quantity that is actually consumed may be lower than this value.

title: Per capita fat consumption from ${food_plural_lower} per day
subtitle: This measures the quantity that is available for consumption at the end of the supply chain. It does not account for consumer waste, so the quantity that is actually consumed may be lower than this value.
